articles.description: The former president of the Spanish football federation has been arrested after flying into Madrid.
articles.title: Luis Rubiales arrested in corruption investigation

articles.description: Chelsea say a clip of Conor Gallagher with a young black mascot has been "taken considerably out of context" and condemn the "unacceptable" abuse of the player.
articles.title: Gallagher abuse condemned after 'out of context' video

articles.description: The Taylor Swift effect has reached far beyond the NFL arena, with Great Britain's women set to challenge when flag football - the sport's non-contact version - makes its Olympic debut.
articles.title: How Taylor Swift is helping flag football keep growing before Olympic debut

articles.description: Tottenham are in talks with "prospective investors" after reporting £86.8m losses in their 2022-23 accounts, says chairman Daniel Levy.
articles.title: Spurs in talks with 'prospective investors' - Levy

articles.description: Manchester City boss Pep Guardiola defends striker Erling Haaland following Roy Keane's criticism after Sunday's 0-0 draw with Arsenal.
articles.title: Guardiola backs Haaland after Keane ‘League Two’ jibe

articles.description: Joel Embiid says his experience with a recent knee injury was "disappointing and depressing" after marking his comeback by scoring 24 points as the Philadelphia 76erbeat the Oklahoma City Thunder.
articles.title: Embiid reveals knee injury ‘took a toll mentally’

articles.description: Lost earnings? Lost fitness? Lost opportunities? Lost time? The issues that Women's Super League players weigh up when adding to their families.
articles.title: 'I couldn't really speak about it' - a decision dividing the WSL

articles.description: Joel Embiid says a two-month injury lay-off was "mentally" tough as he returns to help the Philadelphia 76ers pick up a 109-105 win against the Oklahoma City Thunder.
articles.title: NBA: Joel Embiid returns from injury as Philadelphia 76ers beat Oklahoma City Thunder

articles.description: Former world champion Mike Tyson says his boxing match against YouTuber Jake Paul on 20 July will be an exhibition bout and not an official fight.
articles.title: Mike Tyson v Jake Paul: Former world champion says boxing match will be an exhibition bout

articles.description: Portlaoise Panthers say they will refuse to replay the final 0.3 seconds of their quarter-final tie against Limerick Sport Eagles because it would be "completely against the spirit of basketball".
articles.title: Portlaoise Panthers: Irish basketball team refuse to replay last 0.3 seconds of quarter-final tie
